<h1 align="center">Hi , I'm Olivier üêß üèì</h1>
<h3 align="center">Machine Learning Engineer</h3>

Hi there! My name is [![Olivier Dulcy](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Olivier_Dulcy-blue?style=flat-square&logo=Linkedin&logoColor=white&link=https://www.linkedin.com/in/olivier-dulcy/)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/olivier-dulcy/) and I work as a Machine Learning Engineer at [![mindee](https://img.shields.io/badge/-mindee-001E3C?logoWidth=22&style=flat-square&link=https://mindee.com&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://mindee.com) ([odulcy-mindee](https://github.com/odulcy-mindee)). I have more than 3 years of experience in Software Engineering in Python, Infrastructure Management and Data Pipelines. I have also advanced knowledge in system administration on Linux and networking.

I have extensive experience working with bare metal servers, particularly with Dell machines (R710, R840) as well as containerization (Docker) and virtualization (QEMU) technologies.

I'm also a co-founder of [Tuxae](https://github.com/Tuxae), ENSAE's IT and Machine Learning student society.

### Fun projects

- [Tuxae/Horoscope](https://github.com/Tuxae/Horoscope)
- [Tuxae/Jamy](https://github.com/Tuxae/Jamy)
- [odulcy/BackgroundMattingV2 (fork)](https://github.com/odulcy/BackgroundMattingV2)
- [odulcy/RobustVideoMatting (fork)](https://github.com/odulcy/RobustVideoMatting)
- [odulcy/Dotfiles](https://github.com/odulcy/Dotfiles)

### Fun fact

I have a small homelab at home consisting of an R710, a T330, and few Raspberry Pis.
